data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Husband, Robert W., Zhang, Zhi-Qiang (2002): Wetapolipus jamiesoni gen. nov., spec. nov. (Acari: Podapolipidae), an ectoparasite of the mountain stone weta, Hemideina maori (Orthoptera: Anostostomatidae) from New Zealand. Zootaxa 125: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.156152
